features: Rejuvenating Aromatherapy Toner: Our balancing facial toner combines the power of aromatherapy with advanced skincare to revitalize and rebalance your skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and radiant.

Natural Botanical Extracts: Formulated with a carefully selected blend of natural botanical extracts, this toner is enriched with nourishing ingredients like lavender, chamomile, and rosemary, which work together to soothe, hydrate, and purify your skin.

Restores pH Balance: This facial toner helps to restore your skin's pH balance after cleansing, prepping it to better absorb serums and moisturizers. It minimizes the appearance of pores and primes the skin for a flawless makeup application.

Aromatherapeutic Experience: Immerse yourself in a calming and invigorating aromatherapeutic experience with every use. The subtle and delightful fragrance of this toner uplifts your senses, reducing stress and promoting a sense of well-being.

Gentle and Suitable for All Skin Types: Formulated without harsh chemicals, parabens, or sulfates, our aromatherapy toner is gentle enough for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It's a perfect addition to your daily skincare routine for a radiant and healthy complexion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing after washing my face
reviews.reviewText: No stinging! That's why I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay formula that could be amazing
reviews.reviewText: Something burns my skin... (Lavender? Lavender is a skin irritant, despite what anybody says.) It stings my cheeks and under my eyes. At first, the reaction wasn't that noticeable, and I considered that it might be from the retinol lotion I also use. Over the last few weeks the burning has worsened to the point of visible redness. Whether it's from the toner alone or reacting with the retinol, I'm not sure, but it's a no-go. My skin has spoken! However, and strangely, my neck and forehead is a-okay with the stuff. (FYI I also use retinol there.) I'm kind of at a loss...I can't recommend this toner, or out and out reject it, either. I just have a strong suspicion that one or all of the fragrant oils is at fault, because the rest of the ingredients list is up to snuff. Certainly avoid this if you know you're sensitive to rose and lavender oils. I think if BWC took these out this toner would be a beauty steal! Glycerin, aloe barbadensis, cucumber, green tea, allantoin, panthenol, and vitamin E are skincare stars. It would be nice if a sample size were available to test for sensitivity. I love supporting this brand.Also, the bottle is made out of the best and safest kind of plastic - #2 HDPE. This shows that genuine thought went into the packaging and I love that. I'll be reusing the bottle for other product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Toner, I love it
reviews.reviewText: This is great toner. You feel it working, removes any excess makeup or dirt that my cleaner left behind while also calming my skin after cleaning. I tried another toner recently and came right back to this one. I won't switch again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Great product and quick delivery, very happy
